items.sentence: How long did it take you to get to Boston by plane?
How many kinds of cheese do you use on your pizzas?
I hope that I can convince you to change your mind.
Have you already decided who you\'re going to hire?
I don\'t think that I got a good grade on the exam.
The shoes you bought for Tom are too small for him.
The store where Tom works is going out of business.
Tom was sitting on the couch with Mary watching TV.
Generally speaking, boys can run faster than girls.
I met Tom last summer just after I moved to Boston.
